title: Downloading takes ForEver
body: After Scanning Files in the New Client it Download 6000 MB Their is any problem in my pc or something....!!?

replies.body: If it's still scanning game files then it's possible that nothing is being downloaded yet.  You should start out with the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure your OS is allowing your games to be scanned without running into problems.  let me know if that helps.
